description: Today you can apply for a job on your phone... Crazy to think this was not possible 5 years ago! Technology is changing so rapidly that employers and candidates are struggling to keep up. In this class you’ll learn the technologies available to you to have a successful job search. You’ll learn social media tools that you should be using and what tools recruiters and HR professionals have to find you. This class will set you up so that you are in front of everyone’s eyes... take it now and they’ll be calling you!
title: Job Searching Skills for 2016
